sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the "Local Food, Farms, and Jobs Act".
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the "Local Food, Farms, and Jobs Act".

sections.heading: Definitions. "Local farm or food products" are products: (1) grown in Illinois; or (2) processed and packaged in Illinois, using at least one ingredient grown in Illinois
sections.text: Definitions. "Local farm or food products" are products: (1) grown in Illinois; or (2) processed and packaged in Illinois, using at least one ingredient grown in Illinois.

sections.heading: Procurement goals for local farm or food products.
sections.text: Procurement goals for local farm or food products.

sections.heading: Farm-school database. The Department of Agriculture shall establish, and make available on its website, a geo-coded  electronic database to facilitate the purchase of fresh produce and food products by schools
sections.text: The database shall, at a minimum, contain the information necessary for (i) schools to id

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
